short.ar: جرب لعبة شرطة مليئة بالأدرينالين مع محاكي هروب سيارة الشرطة.
short.am: በፖሊስ መኪና ማምለጫ ሲምዩሌተር በመጠቀም በአድሬናሊን የተሞላ የፖሊስ ጨዋታ ተሞክሮ ይኑርህ።
short.bg: Насладете се на адреналин пълна полицейска игра с полицията кола бягство симулатор.
short.bn: পুলিশ গাড়ি এস্কেপ সিমুলেটর দিয়ে একটি অ্যাড্রেনালিন-ভরা পুলিশ গেমের অভিজ্ঞতা নিন।
short.ca: Viu un joc policial ple d'adrenalina amb un simulador d'escapament de cotxes policials.
short.cs: Zažijte adrenalinovou policejní hru s únikovým simulátorem policejního auta.
short.da: Oplev et adrenalinfyldt politispil med politibilflugtsimulator.
short.de: Erlebe ein adrenalingeladenes Polizeispiel mit dem Polizeiauto-Fluchtsimulator.
short.el: Ζήστε ένα αστυνομικό παιχνίδι γεμάτο αδρεναλίνη με προσομοιωτή διαφυγής αστυνομικού αυτοκινήτου.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: Experience an adrenaline-filled police game with police car escape simulator.
short.es: Experimenta un juego de policía lleno de adrenalina con el simulador de escape de coches de policía.
short.fa: یک بازی پلیس پر از ادرنالین را با شبیه ساز فرار ماشین پلیس تجربه کنید.
short.fil: Makaranas ng isang laro ng pulisya na puno ng adrenaline na may simulator ng pagtakas ng kotse ng pulis.
short.fr: Vivez un jeu de police rempli d’adrénaline avec simulateur d’évasion de voiture de police.
short.gu: પોલીસની કાર એસ્કેપ સિમ્યુલેટર સાથે એડ્રેનાલાઇનથી ભરેલી પોલીસ ગેમનો અનુભવ કરો.
short.he: בואו לחוות משחק משטרתי מלא אדרנלין עם סימולטור בריחה של ניידת משטרה.
short.hi: पुलिस कार एस्केप सिम्युलेटर के साथ एक एड्रेनालाईन से भरे पुलिस गेम का अनुभव करें।
short.hr: Doživite policijsku igru ispunjenu adrenalinom uz simulator bijega policijskih automobila.
short.hu: Élj át egy adrenalinnal teli rendőrségi játékot a rendőrautó menekülési szimulátorral.
short.id: Rasakan permainan polisi yang penuh adrenalin dengan simulator pelarian mobil polisi.
short.it: Prova un gioco di polizia pieno di adrenalina con il simulatore di fuga dell'auto della polizia.
short.ja: パトカー脱出シミュレーターでアドレナリンに満ちた警察ゲームを体験してください。
short.kn: ಪೊಲೀಸ್ ಕಾರ್ ಎಸ್ಕೇಪ್ ಸಿಮ್ಯುಲೇಟರ್ ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ಅಡ್ರಿನಾಲಿನ್ ತುಂಬಿದ ಪೊಲೀಸ್ ಆಟವನ್ನು ಅನುಭವಿಸಿ.
short.ko: 경찰차 탈출 시뮬레이터로 아드레날린이 솟구치는 경찰 게임을 경험하세요.
short.lv: Izbaudiet adrenalīna pilnu policijas spēli ar policijas automašīnas evakuācijas simulatoru.
short.ml: പോലീസ് കാർ എസ്കേപ്പ് സിമുലേറ്റർ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് അഡ്രിനാലിൻ നിറച്ച പോലീസ് ഗെയിം അനുഭവിക്കുക.
short.mr: पोलिस कार एस्केप सिम्युलेटरसह अॅड्रेनालाईनने भरलेल्या पोलिस गेमचा अनुभव घ्या.
short.ms: Alami permainan polis yang penuh adrenalin dengan simulator melarikan diri dari kereta polis.
short.nl: Ervaar een adrenaline-gevuld politiespel met een ontsnappingssimulator voor politieauto's.
short.no: Opplev et adrenalinfylt politispill med rømningssimulator for politibiler.
short.pl: Przeżyj pełną adrenaliny grę policyjną z symulatorem ucieczki samochodu policyjnego.
short.ro: Experimentați un joc de poliție plin de adrenalină cu simulatorul de evacuare a mașinii de poliție.
short.ru: Испытайте наполненную адреналином полицейскую игру с симулятором побега из полицейской машины.
short.sk: Zažite adrenalínovú policajnú hru so simulátorom úniku z policajného auta.
short.sl: Doživite adrenalinsko policijsko igro s simulatorjem pobega policijskega avtomobila.
short.sv: Upplev ett adrenalinfyllt polisspel med polisbilflyktsimulator.
short.sw: Uzoefu mchezo wa polisi uliojazwa na Sonic na simulator ya kutoroka gari la polisi.
short.ta: போலீஸ் கார் எஸ்கேப் சிமுலேட்டருடன் அட்ரினலின் நிரப்பப்பட்ட போலீஸ் விளையாட்டை அனுபவியுங்கள்.
short.te: పోలీస్ కార్ ఎస్కేప్ సిమ్యులేటర్ తో ఆడ్రినలిన్ నిండిన పోలీసు ఆటను అనుభవించండి.
short.th: สัมผัสประสบการณ์เกมตํารวจที่เต็มไปด้วยอะดรีนาลีนด้วยเครื่องจําลองการหลบหนีของรถตํารวจ
short.tr: Polis arabası kaçış simülatörü ile adrenalin dolu bir polis oyunu yaşayın.
short.uk: Випробуйте наповнену адреналіном поліцейську гру за допомогою симулятора втечі поліцейської машини.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Escape and reach the heights of action with Police Car Escape Simulator in a world with stylized graphics and captivating sound effects. This game allows you to settle in a land full of desert landscapes, and you have to show your driving skills as you fight against the police cars after you.

There are four different vehicle options in the game, and the features of each vehicle are different. While some vehicles are more durable, others stand out with their speed. The main aim of the game is to neutralize the police cars that follow you and make the highest score. To achieve this goal, you must use your driving skills to the fullest and try to stop the police cars by crashing into the surrounding objects. Desert terrain is the backdrop for your escape adventure.

This game, among the police games, draws attention as an escape simulator where action and excitement come together. Push your driving skills to the limit in this game full of desert landscapes; police car chases, and action-packed shootouts. Enjoy the escape with Police Car Escape Simulator; become the best escapee by getting high scores while escaping from the cops.

How To Play
You can use WASD or arrow keys to move your vehicle. You have to use the mouse to shoot rockets from your vehicle where necessary.

Police Car Escape Simulator Game Features
✓ Realistic sounds
✓ 4 Different Car
✓ Easy control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Police Car Escape Simulator Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
